Subject: FCBRASIL - CPF (ID/BR) detecting other contents
Description:
Hello Team,

Some of our costumers are facing an issue about the Id/br detecting false positives that doesnt even have the same amount of numbers that the ID should have and other incongruencies. now, i faced that on my side too, so i think it would be best for us to see into that bug on my side while the costumers use a regex as a workaround.

Best regards,
What_We_Know__c:
04Feb: Upgraded to 5941 + client upgrade. Uploads were blocked correctly now.
Checking with Cristi H. for explanation if fixes were included in 5941 compared to 5940.

Added video with explanation of issue. Customer also had licenses expired and we could not generate logs.

Solution_Comment__c: We are closing this ticket based on the improvements on Brasil ID/PII included in the upcoming release - 5.9.4.3.
